title: Bandbox And Lid, ca. 1831
medium: Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support
inscribed: Written inside lid, in pencil: "Rosanna Carmany 1836."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Box bottom has fanciful scene of rhinoceros with hunters on foot and on horseback, with background of mountains. Lid has view of large building on manicured grounds, with legend of the "Deaf and Dumb Asylum".

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox And Lid, ca. 1831.
ca. 1831. Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1913-17-16-a,b.
